### Mendeley 

[Mendeley](https://www.mendeley.com) is a free citation and PDF organizer. Create an account and download Mendeley for desktop. See [here](https://www.mendeley.com/guides/using-citation-editor) for how to get started []().

### Concept maps

Use concept maps. Check out Carmen's [blog](https://theinformalscientist.com/concept-maps-and-the-path-to-deep-learning/) on this topic. 


### Quick Links to Recommended Books
[Evolution in Four Dimensions](https://mitpress.mit.edu/books/evolution-four-dimensions) by Eva Jablonka and Marion Lamb

[The Selfish Gene](https://global.oup.com/academic/product/the-selfish-gene-9780198788607?cc=us&lang=en&) by Richard Dawkins

[The Extended Phenotype](https://global.oup.com/academic/product/the-extended-phenotype-9780198788911?q=extended%20phenotype&lang=en&cc=us) by Richard Dawkins

[Why We Get Sick: The New Science of Darwinian Medicine](https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/81788.Why_We_Get_Sick) by Randy Nesse and George Williams

[Plague Time](https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/books/47554/plague-time-by-paul-ewald/) by Paul Ewald

[Evolution of Infectious Disease](https://www.amazon.com/Evolution-Infectious-Disease-Paul-Ewald/dp/0195111397) by Paul Ewald
